name: Sword'N'Jump
description:
A Platform Game written in Python with PyGame.

Code: https://github.com/TigaxMT/Sword-N-Jump

Controls

Jump = Up Arrow

Right = Right Arrow

Left = Left Arrow

Attack = SpaceBar

BackFlip = Down Arrow + Left Arrow

Pause = ESC

Credits

Progammers: Tiago Martins(Twitter) & Kelvin Ferreira(Twitter)

Sounds: Bruna Silva(Soundcloud  | Youtube | Twitter)

Design: Zuhria Alfitra a.k.a pzUH(Website) & Tiago Martins
